headline: Henry Schein (HSIC): Assessing Valuation After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Henry Schein (HSIC) shares have moved only slightly over the past day, trading at $62.90 at the close. Investors are keeping an eye on the company’s performance, especially after recent declines seen over the past month. See our latest analysis for Henry Schein. After a tough year, Henry Schein’s share price has slipped by 8.2% year-to-date and the one-year total shareholder return is down 10.4%.
